page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT & ENERGY
page.content: This area includes: a Publican,Haulage Contractor, Hairdresser, Peripetetic Music Teacher, Garage Mech: Painter, Office Worker, Building Worker, R.A.F. Corporal, Hospital Ward Clerk,Building Supplies Manager, Pharmacist, Electr_ _ician, 5 Farmers, 7 Farm Workers, a Farm Foreman, Stockman, Shepherd, 2 Gardeners, 3 Unemployed and 17 Retired ENERGY _ Most folk retain coal fires but majority now have central heating powered by electricity, solid fuel,oil and more recently Gas stored in tanks. Many supplement with roof and cavity wall insulation and double glazing, giving greater warmth in what can be a windswept area. Currently on old air_ field are huge stacks of large pipes intended for part of National Gas Transmission System linking the Humber with a station north of Lincoln.
